flags.name: Rainbow Flag
flags.description: The Rainbow Flag, or Gay Pride Flag, is a symbol of LGBTQ+ pride. It represents diversity and equality within the LGBTQ+ community.

flags.name: Lesbian Flag
flags.description: The Lesbian Flag represents lesbian pride and is a symbol of love and unity among lesbians.

flags.name: Bisexual Flag
flags.description: The Bisexual Flag is a symbol of bisexual pride, embracing both same-sex and different-sex attractions.

flags.name: Pansexual Flag
flags.description: The Pansexual Flag represents pansexuality, the attraction to people regardless of their gender or gender identity.

flags.name: Progress Pride
flags.description: The Progress Pride Flag is an inclusive design, incorporating the Rainbow Flag with colors symbolizing transgender and marginalized communities.

flags.name: Transgender Flag
flags.description: The Transgender Flag is a symbol of transgender pride and represents the transgender community.

flags.name: Intersex Flag
flags.description: The Intersex Flag represents intersex people and their rights, challenging binary views of gender.

flags.name: Nonbinary Flag
flags.description: The Nonbinary Flag represents nonbinary and genderqueer individuals, celebrating gender diversity.

flags.name: Asexual Flag
flags.description: The Asexual Flag is a symbol of asexuality, representing individuals who experience little or no sexual attraction.

flags.name: Genderfluid Flag
flags.description: The Genderfluid Flag represents genderfluidity, where one's gender identity may change over time.

flags.name: Agender Flag
flags.description: The Agender Flag represents agender individuals, who identify as having no gender or being gender-neutral.

flags.name: Genderqueer Flag
flags.description: The Genderqueer Flag is a symbol of genderqueer and non-conforming individuals who don't fit traditional gender categories.

flags.name: Ally Flag
flags.description: The Ally Flag represents allies of the LGBTQ+ community who support and advocate for LGBTQ+ rights and equality.

flags.name: Polyamory Flag
flags.description: The Polyamory Flag is a symbol of polyamorous relationships, where individuals can have multiple consensual partners.

flags.name: Demigender Flag
flags.description: The Demigender Flag represents demigender individuals, whose gender identity is partially but not wholly male, female, or other genders.

flags.name: Lipstick Lesbian Flag
flags.description: The Lipstick Lesbian Flag is a symbol of feminine lesbian individuals who embrace their gender expression.

flags.name: Polysexual Flag
flags.description: The Polysexual Flag represents polysexuality, where individuals are attracted to multiple genders, but not necessarily all genders.

flags.name: Aromantic Flag
flags.description: The Aromantic Flag is a symbol of aromantic individuals who experience little or no romantic attraction.

flags.name: Gay Mens Flag
flags.description: The Gay Men's Flag represents gay men's pride and is a symbol of love, solidarity, and rights within the gay community.
